project.description:
about.html : Simple page featuring a link to an image and a few paragraphs. It serves to introduce the basic structure of an HTML page and its elements: html tag head tag : which is used to set the page title body tag : which is used for the contents of the page
The content use headings h1 and paragraphs p. It also links to an image using img.
